data.title: 2019 April Monthly Online Sale

FIRST SAMURAI (USA) (2003). 5 wins-4 at 2-from 6f to 9f, Belmont Champagne S., Gr.1. Sire of 440 rnrs, 315 wnrs, 26 SW, inc. Executiveprivilege (Del Mar Debutante S., Gr.1), Lea, etc. Sire of the dams of SW Ruby Love, Ms Locust Point, Sully's Dream, Homespun Hero, SP Overanalyzer, Bebo Lucky Road, Blame the Frog, Poppy's Destiny, Western Curl, Best of Me, Dazzling Chic, One Last Cast, Pride of Stride and of Clifton Sunset, Nadeshico, Muhajjal, etc.

1st dam

CHASETHEWILDWIND, by Forty Niner. 3 wins to 6Â½f, Hollywood Park Allowance 3YO+f&m. Half-sister to KING CHARLEMAGNE, MESHAHEER, Chasetheragingwind (dam of HERE COMES BEN). Dam of 8 named foals, 7 to race, 6 winners, inc:-

ALBERTUS MAXIMUS (c by Albert the Great). 6 wins from 1m to 9f, US$1,208,230, 441,600Dhs, Gulfstream Park Donn H., Gr.1, Del Mar Windy Sands H., L, Breeders' Cup Dirt Mile S., L, Hollywood Park Allowance-twice, 2d Hollywood Park Swaps S., Gr.2, Affirmed H., Gr.3, 3d Oak Tree Goodwood S., Gr.1, 4th Hollywood Park Californian S., Gr.2. Sire.

DAREDEVIL (c by More Than Ready). 2 wins at 2, US$424,600, Belmont Champagne S., Gr.1, 2d Gulfstream Park Swale S., Gr.2, 4th Aqueduct Wood Memorial S., Gr.1.

Chasethegold (f by Touch Gold). 3 wins from 6Â½f to 8Â½f, Hollywood Park Allowance, Santa Anita Allowance, 2d Santa Anita Senator Ken Maddy H., Gr.3, 4th Santa Anita Las Cienegas H., Gr.3. Dam of 4 winners-

Goldrush Girl (f Political Force) 2 wins-1 at 2-at 8Â½f, 9f, 2d Churchill Downs Golden Rod S., Gr.2. Dam of-

Try Me Again. Winner at 1m in 2018 in U.S.A.

Broken Marriage. Winner at 7f in U.S.A.

Lemon Drop Prize. Winner at 2 in U.S.A.

Cayala. Winner at 6f in U.S.A. Dam of-

ONE LINER (c Into Mischief) 4 wins-1 at 2-from 5Â½f to 8Â½f, US$475,250, to 2018, Oaklawn Park Southwest S., Gr.3, 2d Pimlico Special S., Gr.3.

Race to the Music (g by Stravinsky). 2 wins at 2, Newmarket Clydesdale Classic 2YO S.

Gutsy Call (c by Malibu Moon). 2 wins at 8Â¼f, 8Â½f, Keeneland Allowance.

Requejada (f by First Samurai). Winner. See below.

Call Mariah (f by Dixie Union). Unraced. Dam of 2 winners-

Califante (f Kyllachy) Winner at 2, 2d Salisbury Stonehenge S., L, Newmarket Adnams Bitter Fillies' Nursery H., 3d Fairyhouse Brownstown S., Gr.3, Newbury Pumpmatic Pump Stations 2YO Fillies' S., 4th Killarney Cairn Rouge S., L.

Rain Wind and Fire. 2 wins at 7f in GB.

2nd dam

RACE THE WILD WIND, by Sunny's Halo. 5 wins from 6f to 8Â½f, US$458,250, Santa Anita Santa Maria H., Gr.1, Hollywood Park Princess S., Gr.2, Oaklawn Park Fantasy S., Gr.2, 2d Hollywood Oaks, Gr.1, Hollywood Park Railbird S., Gr.2, Del Mar Oaks, Gr.2, Santa Anita La Brea S., Gr.3. Three-quarter-sister to MOUNT LEMON, half-sister to Garden Grove (dam of MATAJI). Dam of 13 foals, 11 to race, 8 winners, inc:-

KING CHARLEMAGNE (c Nureyev) Champion 3YO Sprinter in France in 2001. 5 wins-2 at 2-to 1400m, Deauville Prix Maurice de Gheest, Gr.1, Curragh Minstrel S., Gr.3, Leopardstown Ballycorus S., Gr.3, Newmarket Somerville Tattersall S., Gr.3, Leopardstown Beechwood 2YO S., 2d York Convivial 2YO S. Sire.

MESHAHEER (c Nureyev) 5 wins-2 at 2-at 6f, 7f, Â£106,415, â¬13,200, 24,392fr., Newmarket July S., Gr.3, Newbury Dubai Duty Free Cup, L, Tattersalls Bosra Sham S., Doncaster Racing Post Weekender S., Zetland 2YO S., 2d Longchamp Prix du Palais Royal, Gr.3, Newbury Dubai Duty Free Cup, L, 3d Deauville Prix Morny, Gr.1, Royal Ascot Jersey S, Gr.3, Coventry S., Gr.3, Goodwood On the House S., L, Epsom Fortune S., L, Haydock Spring Trophy, L, 4th Newmarket Criterion S., Gr.3. Sire.

Run With the Wind. 7 wins from 1Â¾m to 20Â¼f, Â£670, â¬79,542, Leopardstown Family Fun Racedays H., 3d Leopardstown Leap on Facebook H.

Meteor Glory. 5 wins from 1300m to 1800m, Sapporo Doshin Sports Sho.

Chasetheragingwind. Winner at 6Â½f in U.S.A. Dam of 5 winners-

HERE COMES BEN (c Street Cry (Ire)) 7 wins from 7f to 8Â½f, US$410,764, Saratoga Forego S., Gr.1, Churchill Downs Kelly's Landing S., L-twice, Keeneland Allowance-twice, 4th Saratoga James Marvin S., L, Indiana Grand Oliver S., L. Sire.

3rd dam

REDPATH, by Indian Chief. Winner at 2 in U.S.A. Sister to BOBBY MURCER, half-sister to PARTEZ. Dam of 11 foals, 8 to race, 3 winners, inc:-

RACE THE WILD WIND (f Sunny's Halo) 5 wins. See above.

Lettuce Miss. 2 wins in U.S.A. Dam of 3 winners-

MOUNT LEMON (g Sunny's Halo) 18 wins-1 at 2-from 6f to 1Â¼m, US$483,417, Turfway Park Fall Championship H., Gr.3.

Garden Grove. Unraced. Dam of 6 winners-

MATAJI (g Best Turn) 18 wins, US$334,725, Calder WL McKnight H., Gr.2.

Mona Lisa. Unplaced. Dam of 4 winners-

CHIRAC (g Sligo Bay) 8 wins from 6Â½f to 9f, US$439,325, Monmouth Philip H Iselin S., Gr.3, 3d Monmouth Cup, Gr.2.

Race Record: Winner at 2, 4th Grand Criterium de Bordeaux, L.

Produce Record: Dam of 3 foals, 2 to race.

2014 Rojo (f by Dutch Art). Raced once.

2015 Eletkra (f by Born to Sea). Unraced.

2016 On the Muscle (c by More Than Ready). Unplaced.

2017 (f by I Am Invincible). Destroyed.
